summary: The diff addresses REQ-3 (phone number removal) and REQ-4 (login button removal) clearly. REQ-1 (theme revert) and REQ-2 (image restoration) are partially addressed â€” the CSS/Tailwind theme appears to be a navy/gold luxury palette which may or may not match pre-v44, and images are referenced via asset paths in pages, but there is no clear evidence that v44-specific theme changes were actually reverted or that original images were restored versus being the same v44 assets.

missing_requirements.requirement: Revert the visual theme to the previous version: restore the original color palette, typography, and styling that existed before version 44.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows index.css and tailwind.config.js with a navy/gold OKLCH palette and Playfair Display/Lato fonts, but there is no evidence these were reverted from v44 changes. The file summaries describe this as 'the original luxury legal color palette' yet without before/after diff context it cannot be confirmed that v44 theme changes were actually undone. The project_state.json still shows AR-4/REQ-1 as pending.

missing_requirements.requirement: Restore all original images that were replaced or removed in version 44. Revert any CSS-based visuals back to the original image assets.
missing_requirements.reason: Pages reference image asset paths but no image files were added or modified in the diff (ADDED FILES: none). There is no evidence that images replaced in v44 were restored to their originals. The project_state.json still shows AR-5/REQ-2 as pending.
